original_text: And even if our gospel is veiled, it is veiled to those who are perishing.
korean_text: 만일 우리의 복음이 가리었으면 망하는 자들에게 가리어진 것이라

sentences.original_text: And even if our gospel is veiled
sentences.korean_translation: 설령 우리의 복음이 가려져 있다 할지라도

sentences.original_text: it is veiled to those who are perishing
